resources.string:
What is this app about? 

 This app demonstrate accuracy of iBeacons inside a room and generate heat map using them.

 I used iBKS105 from accent-systems
 transmit interval: 0.1sec

 In this demo you can set size of a room and accuracy method, because the raw data from beacons are not precize enought. I use a https://github.com/alt236/Bluetooth-LE-Library---Android library that gives me the accuration in meters for each beacon.
For this demo you will need 3 iBeacons.\n Fisrt, assign colors to your iBeacons in \'setup iBeacons\'. You don\'t have to set UUID or major/minor, I use only bluetooth address.
Set size of your room and select one of the accuracy methods to get more precise values.
Place your iBeacon as picture above in the middle of the walls. If you place the iBeacons wrong, you can get misleading results.
Launch \'generate heat map\' and watch your position. You should see a heatmap of your moves.
To generate iBeacons please cofigure 3 different iBeacons
Sorry, your device does not support Bluetooth LE

string-array.item: Averaged over last two values of the last 2 seconds.
Averaged over last two values of the last 15 values. Maximum change from the previous position is limited to 0.1 meter.
